
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int ar[]={0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};
int m(int n)
{
     int s=0,i;
for(i=n;i;i/=10) s+=ar[i%10];
return s%10;

}
int max(int a,int b){
int i,s=0;
for(i=a;i<=b;i++) s+=m(i);
return s;
}
int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
        int a,b;
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
          int sum;
             sum=m(a)+45*(b/10-a/10)+ max((b/10)*10,b)- max((a/10)*10,a);
        printf("%d\n",sum);

    }

    return 0;
}
